author: hlship
msg: Strip out $Id$ tags from test files and code.

author: hlship
msg: Add encoding and decoding of query parameters into the servlet path ("friendly URLs").
Add asset: and bean: binding prefixes.
Begin adding support for modules (pages in subdirectories).

author: hlship
msg: Take advantage of new class-mocking support in HiveMindTestCase.

author: hlship
msg: Rework how Tapestry URLs are formatted, breaking the "service context" into a number of individual query parameters with well-known names.

author: hlship
msg: More refactoring of EngineServiceLink; parameters are now more uniformly treated (and encoded).
